com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class BaseBorderLayer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseBorderLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
BorderLayer, Cloneable
public class BaseBorderLayer
extends Object
implements BorderLayer

The BaseBorderLayer class helps to define how the border of a given Element is drawn. The user can customize the border style of a Element by the class.

See Also:
BorderLayer
